# Specify Names & Events
```{r}
names <- c("WESLEY KIPTOO", "AARON BIENENFELD", "ALEC SANDUSKY", "ERIC HAMER", "AMON KEMBOI", "ADRIAAN WILDSCHUTT", "GILBERT BOIT", "SHEA FOSTER", "JACOB MCLEOD", "BEN VEATCH", "MORGAN BEADLESCOMB", "MATT YOUNG", "COLTON JOHNSEN", "ANDREW JORDAN", 
           "ALEC BASTEN", "DEVIN MYRER")

event <- "5000m"

division <- "D1"

gender <- "M"
```

```{r error=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
generatePredictions <- function(names, event, gender, division) {
  # Loop to create predictions
  names <- names
  runner_name <- c()
  runner_time <- c()
  simulation <- c()
  
  # Get top performances
  perfs_cy <- lines %>%
  filter(EVENT == event & (NAME %in% names)) %>% #& (YEAR %in% c("2021", "2020"))) %>%
    group_by(NAME) %>%
    #arrange(TIME) %>%
    #slice_head(n = 2) %>%
    mutate(
      TIME_ADJ = case_when(
        YEAR == '2021' ~ TIME,
        YEAR == '2020' ~ TIME * 1.02,
        T ~ TIME * 1.05
      )
    ) %>%
    arrange(TIME_ADJ) %>%
    slice_head(n = 2)

  # Get all performances
  perfs_all <- lines %>%
    filter(EVENT == event & (NAME %in% names) & (YEAR %in% c("2021", "2020", "2019"))) %>%
    group_by(NAME) %>%
    arrange(TIME) %>%
    slice_head(n = 3) %>%
    mutate(
      TIME_ADJ = TIME
      )
  
  # Get sd of group
  grp_sd <- sd(perfs_all$TIME_ADJ, na.rm = T) * 1.5
    
  
    for(j in 1:1000)
    {
      # Print out for running simulation
      print(paste0("Running simulation: ", j))
      
      for(i in 1:length(names))
      {
        # Subset data to runner
        results <- perfs_cy %>% filter(NAME == names[i])
        results_all <- perfs_all %>% filter(NAME == names[i])
        # Create an SD to use
        temp_sd <- case_when(
          (sd(results_all$TIME_ADJ, na.rm = T) > grp_sd) | is.na(sd(results_all$TIME_ADJ)) ~ grp_sd,
          T ~ sd(results_all$TIME_ADJ, na.rm = T)
        )
        # Generate random sample
        pred_time <- rnorm(1, mean(results$TIME_ADJ, na.rm = T), temp_sd)
        # Add time and name to vectors
        runner_name <- append(runner_name, names[i])
        runner_time <- append(runner_time, pred_time)
        simulation <- append(simulation, j)
      }
    }
  
  # Dataframe of results
  sim <- as.data.frame(cbind(runner_name, runner_time, simulation)) %>%
    mutate(
      runner_time = as.numeric(runner_time)
    )
  
  sim_results <- sim %>%
    group_by(simulation) %>%
    arrange(runner_time) %>%
    mutate(
      pred_place = 1:n()
    )
  
  sim_grouped <- sim_results %>%
    group_by(runner_name) %>%
    summarise(
      pred_wins = n_distinct(simulation[pred_place==1]),
      avg_pred_place = mean(pred_place)
    ) %>%
    mutate(
      pred_win_prob = round((pred_wins / 1000) * 100, 2)
    )
  
  # Assign division and gender
  sim_grouped$Gender <- gender
  sim_grouped$Division <- division
  
  # Return data
  return(sim_grouped)
}
```

```{r}
generatePredictions2 <- function(names, event) {
  # Loop to create predictions
  names <- names
  runner_name <- c()
  runner_time <- c()
  simulation <- c()
  
  perfs <- lines %>%
  filter(EVENT == event & (NAME %in% names) & (YEAR %in% c("2021", "2020", "2019"))) %>%
    group_by(NAME) %>%
    arrange(TIME) %>%
    slice_head(n = 3)
  
    for(j in 1:2000)
    {
      # Print out for running simulation
      print(paste0("Running simulation: ", j))
      
      for(i in 1:length(names))
      {
        # Subset data to runner
        results <- perfs %>% filter(NAME == names[i])

        # Generate random sample
        pred_time <- runif(1, min(results$TIME), max(results$TIME))
        # Add time and name to vectors
        runner_name <- append(runner_name, names[i])
        runner_time <- append(runner_time, pred_time)
        simulation <- append(simulation, j)
      }
    }
  
  # Dataframe of results
  sim <- as.data.frame(cbind(runner_name, runner_time, simulation)) %>%
    mutate(
      runner_time = as.numeric(runner_time)
    )
  
  sim_results <- sim %>%
    group_by(simulation) %>%
    arrange(runner_time) %>%
    mutate(
      pred_place = 1:n()
    )
  
  sim_grouped <- sim_results %>%
    group_by(runner_name) %>%
    summarise(
      pred_wins = n_distinct(simulation[pred_place==1]),
      avg_pred_place = mean(pred_place)
    ) %>%
    mutate(
      pred_win_prob = round((pred_wins / 2000) * 100, 2)
    )
  
  # Return data
  return(sim_grouped)
}
```
